description:
With a retro look that will have you remembering campsite adventures from your childhood, the Microdini Hoody delivers timeless comfort. A fusion of two of Patagonia’s classic designs, this hoodie blends the lightweight warmth of the Micro D, with the wind stopping power of the Houdini. The result is a light fleece that layers well and adds a little toasty style wherever you need it.

  • Body is made from a lightweight recycled polyester velour fleece
  • Overlay is made from recycled nylon ripstop with a PFC-free DWR
  • Deep adjustable hood adds warmth where you need it most
  • Fleecy pockets keep your hands out of the elements
  • Fair Trade Certified sewing
  • Regular fit
name: Patagonia Microdini Hoody - Women's
